titles: Mysterious cloudes and mistes, shunning the cleer light, a little further disclosed in a short answer to Mr. John Simpsons long appendix, entituled, Truth breaking forth through a cloud and mist of slanders, wherein the charge of slander, so far as it concerneth, both himself and some others, is taken of and removed / by Tho. Gataker ...
author: Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.
publisher: Printed by E. Griffin, and are to be sold by Fulke Clifton ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
